amendment.description: To modify the effect date of the termination of the phase-in of concurrent receipt of retired pay and veterans disability compensation for veterans with service-connected disabilities rated as total by virtue of unemployability.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4197 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4197 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S6346-6366; text: CR S6354) To modify the effect date of the termination of the phase-in of concurrent receipt of retired pay and veterans disability compensation for veterans with service-connected disabilities rated as total by virtue of unemployability.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4197 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4197 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reid.
